articles.description: Matt Mobley scored 30 points and grabbed nine rebounds, Jaylen Adams added 26 points with five assists and four steals and St. Bonaventure beat La Salle 79-68 on Tuesday night for its first seven-game Atlantic 10 winning streak in program history.
articles.headline: St. Bonaventure wins 7th straight A-10 game for 1st time

articles.description: Jaelen Sanford scored 21 points on 6-of-9 shooting and Tre'Shaun Fletcher had 17 points and eight rebounds to help Toledo beat Ohio 82-74 on Tuesday night for its fourth win in a row.
articles.headline: Sanford scores 21, Fletcher 17 as Toledo beats Ohio 82-74

articles.description: Matt Lewis halted a scoring drought, making two free throws in the final seconds, to give James Madison a 62-61 win over UNC Wilmington on Tuesday night.
articles.headline: Lewis sinks late FTs, James Madison takes 62-61 victory

articles.description: Oklahoma's Trae Young cannot connect from behind the arc as the Sooner returns to his hometown to face Big 12 rivals Texas Tech in Lubbock.
articles.headline: Young struggles against Texas Tech

images.caption: Oklahoma's Trae Young cannot connect from behind the arc as the Sooner returns to his hometown to face Big 12 rivals Texas Tech in Lubbock.
images.name: Young struggles against Texas Tech

articles.description: Elijah Minnie tossed in 24 points and James Thompson IV finished with his 18th double-double of the season to help Eastern Michigan hold off Miami (Ohio) 58-57 on Tuesday night.
articles.headline: Eastern Michigan holds off Miami (OH) 58-57

articles.description: Udoka Azubuike scored 19 points, Malik Newman had 17 and 13th-ranked Kansas bounced back from a brutal loss at Baylor by beating Iowa State 83-77 on Tuesday.
articles.headline: No. 13 Kansas holds off Iowa State 83-77

images.caption: Lagerald Vick lobs it to Udoka Azubuike for another alley-oop.
images.name: Azubuike cannot be stopped
